name: NeverMoreEnd EverMoreEmpty
description:
The girl woke up in a strange forest.
For some reason, I used the weapon I had in my hand
Start walking aiming for "somewhere" ...

Curious hero, country girl Rize travels with Furari
It is an action erotic RPG.

The stage is the Kingdom of Fruy, who worships the Creator God.
It's not that monsters are a little active these days
In a peaceful country of art that doesn't bother to fight
Follow the main quest in a lawful manner or deviate from the side road
Buy and eat, dance, sing and play in the bar
Become a model of a picture, be molested, become a saleswoman
While being addicted to the wall and being sexually harassed in various places
You can freely bounce around one continent.
